dmca.title: Mir Internet Marketing Claims Copyright Infringement (#5)
dmca.body:
Mir Internet Marketing, Inc.
    [Private]
    Chicago, IL 60647
    October 24, 2002

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[Private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Google Customer Support Professionals,

The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on
http://www.seologic.com/placement/pay-per-click-advertising.php.

Search Query: "your customers' searching habits in our role as your Internet"
http://www.google.com/search?sourceid=navclient&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-
B&q=%22your+customers%27+searching+habits+in+our+role+as+your+Internet%22

Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.pagetraffic.com/search-engine-marketing.htm

Contact Information from site:
OFFICE OF CANDID INFOSYS IN INDIA:
[Private]
New Delhi (INDIA)
[Private]
[Private]

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.


Sincerely,

[Private]
Mir Internet Marketing, Inc.
[Private]
[Private]
[Private]
